user_query: and not forget them. thank one's parents. "I miss you". I always talk about my parents in every interview Also, since the story of Peter Sohn is the theme of this movie, the Korean image of eating spicy food is changed into a scene of eating hot food The main character, Ember, calls her father Ashfa, and the name is inspired by her father, a word that calls her father in Korea Not only that, but Ember was born in the United States, so she's familiar with English, but at home, she calls her family by her parents' mother tongue, which shows the second generation of immigrants In addition, the Ember family's shop was purposely designed to look like a Korean cauldron, and this ventilator in the store was modeled after a ventilator that is common in Korean meat restaurants In the Elemental movie, there's a scene where Peter Sohn's father bowed to his family just before he left when he immigrated to the United States Disney's Elemental was chosen as the title using Elemental, an English word meaning element The reason why I named it like this is because the story is based on the original theory that the world is made up of water, fire, earth, and air The reason why I made this movie is because of the periodic table that Peter Sohn saw in high school Peter Sohn looked at the periodic table, and when he was a kid, the apartment looked like people living in boxes I thought it was a good metaphor for a variety of people Also, the reason why it depicts the story of a fire and water

entities.entity_description: Peter Sohn은 Elemental 영화의 감독으로, 자신의 이민자 가족 이야기를 영화의 주제로 삼았으며, 인터뷰에서 항상 부모님에 대해 이야기한다고 언급했다
Elemental은 디즈니 영화로, 물, 불, 흙, 공기로 이루어진 세계를 배경으로 하며, 감독 Peter Sohn의 이민자 가족 이야기를 담고 있다. 영어로 '원소'를 의미하는 단어에서 제목을 따왔다
Ember는 Elemental의 주인공으로, 미국에서 태어난 이민 2세대이며, 영어에 익숙하지만 집에서는 부모님의 모국어로 가족을 부른다. 아버지를 한국어에서 영감을 받은 'Ashfa'라고 부른다
Ashfa는 Ember의 아버지로, 이름은 한국어로 아버지를 부르는 말에서 영감을 받았으며, 미국으로 이민 오기 직전 가족에게 절을 했던 장면이 영화에 나온다

relationships.relationship_description: Peter Sohn은 Elemental의 감독이며 자신의 개인적인 이민자 가족 이야기를 영화의 주제로 삼았다
Ashfa는 Elemental 영화에 등장하는 Ember의 아버지 캐릭터이다
Peter Sohn은 자신의 이민 2세대 경험을 바탕으로 Ember 캐릭터를 창조했다
Peter Sohn은 자신의 아버지 이야기를 바탕으로 Ashfa 캐릭터를 만들었으며, 이민 직전 가족에게 절하는 장면을 포함시켰다
